title: Emotes don't work!?!?
body: I recently bought the Teemo scout approved emote and used it several times in the game. After the latest patch, my emotes do not show in game for some reason, icon and all gone like I had never assigned the emotes. I checked the emotes in my collection tab and the champ select tab that allows you to change it after lock-in or lock-in timer. I cannot show off my Teemo now whenever I have a nice clutch or kill, PLEASE HELP!!!

replies.body: Yep same here.  Super sad, just want to battle bunny riven roar! Friend has the same issue. Please fix riot, I mean I'm sure you're on it anyway.

Since the patch it doesnt work for me either,
today i notice at the start of match it says "emotes are here press T" but the wheel is empty despite of the fact I have bought a couple of them n placed them in wheel from client n saved it
Yep same, it doesn't work for me too!
